summary: A ruthless editor tries to get his top reporter to cover one more crime story before retirement.
cast: Jack Lemmon|Walter Matthau|Susan Sarandon|Vincent Gardenia|David Wayne|Allen Garfield|Austin Pendleton|Charles Durning|Herb Edelman|Martin Gabel|Harold Gould|Cliff Osmond|Dick O'Neill|Jon Korkes|Lou Frizzell|Paul Benedict|Doro Merande|Noam Pitlik|Joshua Shelley|Allen Jenkins|John Furlong|Biff Elliot|Barbara Davis|Leonard Bremen|Carol Burnett|Bob Harks|Mark Sawtelle
title: Primera plana
